missing_angles: ✓ AI-powered valuation tools (NO competitor has this)
✓ Data-driven pricing strategy (only generic advice exists)
✓ Emotional + practical combined approach (handvollhufeisen has emotion, others have listings)
✓ 'Avoid underpricing' focus (no competitor emphasizes potential losses)
✓ ROI calculation for valuation service (€14.90 vs €3,000-9,000 loss prevention)
✓ Modern technology angle (all competitors are traditional/manual)
✓ Speed emphasis (valuation in 2 minutes vs weeks of research)
✓ Pre-listing optimization (position as BEFORE marketplace step)
content_format_gaps: Interactive pricing calculator (all competitors lack tools)
Video explainer (only NativeHorses has video, but different topic)
Case studies with real numbers (no competitor shows ROI)
Comparison table: With vs Without Valuation (ROI visualization)
FAQ schema targeting PAA questions (weak competition)

competitive_positioning_recommendations.primary_message: Verkaufen Sie Ihr Pferd zum optimalen Preis - nicht 20-30% unter Wert
secondary_messages: KI-gestützte Bewertung in 2 Minuten, nicht wochenlang raten
Emotional UND rational: Würdevoller Abschied mit fairem Preis
avoid_direct_competition_with: ehorses.de - Position as complementary, not competitive
pferde.de - Don't attack free listings, emphasize pre-listing optimization
sporthorses.de - Acknowledge premium segment, but serve mass market too
partnership_opportunities: Mention ehorses/pferde.de as 'where to list AFTER getting valuation'
Position as 'recommended first step before posting on any platform'
